DOC.brief_summary: A single center , non-controlled trial document gastrointestinal ( GI ) tolerability study formula ( SF ) , contain whey protein concentrate enrich alpha-lactalbumin ( WPC alpha-lac ) feed 6 week healthy , term infant .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study examine tolerable acceptability infant formula Whey protein concentrate contain alpha-lactalbumin measure GI tolerance , eat behavior .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Written inform consent 2 . Healthy , full term , singleton infant 3 . Be 28±7 day postnatal age 4 . Infants enrollment , weightforage ≥ 5th ≤ 95th percentile accord World Health Organization growth table / chart 5 . Infants must exclusively consume tolerate cow 's milk infant formula minimum 3 consecutive day parent ( ) /LAR must previously make decision continue exclusively formula feed 6 . Have sufficient command Tagalog English language complete inform consent study document 7 . Are willing able fulfill requirement study protocol 8 . Have reach legal age consent Philippines 9 . Able contact telephone throughout study 1 . Infants receive amount supplemental human milk 2 . Family history sibling document cow 's milk protein intolerance/allergy 3 . Conditions require infant feeding specify protocol
